xmlkeyword.term: Eiffel for .NET Compliance Checker, User interface

paragraph.paragraph: This section of the documentation explains the user interface of the Eiffel for .NET Compliance Checker and how you can manage project, create reports and export those reports to disk.

10_using_the_toolbar.xmlUsing the Toolbar
Describes the application toolbar and its functions.

20_project_settings.xmlCompliance Projects
Describes the user interface of the Project Settings tab and how to maninpulate a project settings for the compliance checker. For information on projects, see ../20_projects/index.xmlCompliance Project

30_compliance_checker.xmlUsing the Compliance Checker
Describes the user interface of the Compliance Checker tab page. The documentation also explains how to generate reports and export those reports to disk.
